attributes.action: Put Stephen Hawking's picture on the new £20 note
attributes.background: Professor Stephen Hawking was one of England's greatest scientists, on a par with Newton (who was on the old £1 note) and Darwin (until recently on the £10 note). To honour his memory and achievements I propose we put his image on the upcoming £20 note.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
